text: The Connecticut native, who is currently a resident of New Jersey, has starred in films like "How to Be Single" and "Addiction" and has made appearances on a number of TV series, including "Gossip Girl," "Law and Order: SVU" and "Quantico," among others.
title: Actor Patrick Boll arrested for soliciting prostitution in sting operation
